naslov: Kuća: 120 m2 i građevinsko zemljište 2784 m2, blizina Karlovca (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Na prodaju vikend kuća uz rijeku Koranu, blizina Karlovca (10 km) Površina kuće: 124 m² + galerija, vrt 353 m2 na čestici od 415 m2, spojena na gradski vodovod i struju, ima i cisternu za kišnicu volumena 4000m3. Kanalizacija: septička jama. Površina zemljišta: 2.784 m² (građevinska zona). Prodaje se predivna starinska drvena kuća, potpuno obnovljena u šarmantnu i funkcionalnu vikendicu pogodnu i za cjelogodišnje stanovanje. Smještena u miru prirode, svega 10 km od Karlovca i oko 55 minuta vožnje od Zagreba, ova nekretnina idealna je za ljubitelje prirode, mira i rijeke Korane. Opis nekretnine: Tlocrt kuće: prizemlje 62 m² + kat 62 m² + galerija Prizemlje: kuhinja, soba, kupaonica s WC-om, spremište, natkrivena terasa, okruženo sve urednim održavanim vrtom punim cvijeća i zelenila. Kat: veliki dnevni boravak s kaminom i galerijom Gradnja: donji dio kuće građen od blok cigle i obložen kamenom, nova hidroizolacija Gornji kat: hrastove planjke (8 cm), vunena izolacija (10 cm) + oblice (10 cm) Stolarija: kvalitetna drvena s dvoslojnim staklima Grijanje: centralno grijanje spojeno na kamin (drva iz vlastite šume – uključena u cijenu) Krov: limene ploče (imitacija crijepa), obnovljen prije cca 10 godina Režije: vrlo niske, cca 50 € mjesečno. Cijeli objekt je pod službenim video nadzorom sa 4 kamere. Zemljište, površina: 2.784 m², u potpunosti u građevinskoj zoni. Mogućnost parcelacije i prodaje kao građevinsko zemljište. Idealno i za izgradnju dodatnih objekata ili očuvanje prirode. Posebnost južna orijentacija, puno prirodnog svjetla, otvoren pogled, mir, okruženje šume i rijeke Korane. Mogućnost kupanja, branja gljiva, jagoda, šetnje – idealno za ljubitelje prirode. Za nekretninu je izdana građevinska i uporabna dozvola. Vlasništvo uredno bez tereta. ----------------- + 385 98 196 6835 +385 91 278 9999 +385 1 211 0212 RE/MAX CITY 2 Mlinska 23, Samobor ------------------------------------------- Weekend house for sale by the Korana River, near Karlovac (10 km) House area: 124 m² + gallery, garden 353 m2 on a plot of 415 m2, connected to city water supply and electricity, also has a rainwater tank with a volume of 4000m3. Sewage: septic tank. Land area: 2,784 m² (construction zone). A beautiful old wooden house for sale, completely renovated into a charming and functional weekend house suitable for year-round living. Located in the peace of nature, only 10 km from Karlovac and about 55 minutes drive from Zagreb, this property is ideal for lovers of nature, peace and the Korana River. Property description: House floor plan: ground floor 62 m² + first floor 62 m² + gallery Ground floor: kitchen, bedroom, bathroom with toilet, storage room, covered terrace, all surrounded by a neat and well-maintained garden full of flowers and greenery. First floor: large living room with fireplace and gallery Construction: lower part of the house built of block bricks and covered with stone, new waterproofing Upper floor: oak planks (8 cm), wool insulation (10 cm) + logs (10 cm) Carpentry: quality wooden with double-glazed windows Heating: central heating connected to the fireplace (wood from our own forest - included in the price) Roof: tin plates (imitation of tiles), renovated about 10 years ago Overhead costs: very low, about €50 per month. The entire facility is under official video surveillance with 4 cameras. Land, area: 2,784 m², completely in a construction zone. Possibility of subdivision and sale as building land. Ideal for building additional buildings or nature conservation. Special features: southern orientation, lots of natural light, open view, peace, surrounded by forest and Korana River. Possibility of swimming, picking mushrooms, strawberries, walking - ideal for nature lovers. A building and use permit has been issued for the property. Ownership is in order and free of encumbrances. ----------------- + 385 98 196 6835 +385 91 278 9999 +385 1 211 0212 RE/MAX CITY 2 Mlinska 23, Samobor
